value.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% weapon damage and call up to 2 wardens, depending on available space, that will each fire a single arrow before returning to their timelines.

The wardens are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% less damage but shoot through friendly targets. All your arrows, including arrows from Shoot and other talents, now phase through friendly targets without causing them harm.

Bow Threading talents will freely swap to your bow when activated if you have one in your secondary slot. You may use the Shoot talent in a similar manner.
value.name: Arrow Stitching

value2.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% weapon damage and call up to 2 wardens, depending on available space, that will each fire a single arrow before returning to their timelines.

The wardens are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% less damage but shoot through friendly targets. All your arrows, including arrows from Shoot and other talents, now phase through friendly targets without causing them harm.

Bow Threading talents will freely swap to your bow when activated if you have one in your secondary slot. You may use the Shoot talent in a similar manner.
value2.name: Arrow Stitching

value.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. When the arrow reaches its destination or hits a target it will draw in all other targets in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 and inflict 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first increases the damage 20, 26, 32, 36, 40 (up to 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Singularity Arrow

value2.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. When the arrow reaches its destination or hits a target it will draw in all other targets in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 and inflict 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first increases the damage 20, 26, 32, 36, 40 (up to 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Singularity Arrow

value.info_text:
Over the next 4 turns you'll fire up to 4 arrows at this target from this location, each dealing 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage to the target.

These shots do not consume ammo.
value.name: Arrow Echoes

value2.info_text:
Over the next 4 turns you'll fire up to 4 arrows at this target from this location, each dealing 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage to the target.

These shots do not consume ammo.
value2.name: Arrow Echoes

value.info_text:
While active 30% of all damage you take is converted into 0.79, 0.55, 0.45, 0.39, 0.36 Paradox per point.

The Paradox is gained over three turns.
value.name: Reality Smearing

value2.info_text:
While active 30% of all damage you take is converted into 0.79, 0.55, 0.45, 0.39, 0.36 Paradox damage.

The Paradox damage is taken over three turns.
value2.name: Reality Smearing

value.info_text:
Infects the target with a corrosive worm for 6 turns that reduces blight and acid resistance by 12%, 22%, 30%, 36%, 42% and feeds off damage taken.

When this effect ends or the target dies the worm will explode, dealing 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 acid damage in a 4 radius ball. This damage will increase by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59% of all damage taken while infected.

The damage dealt by the effect will increase with spellpower.
value.name: Corrosive Worm

value2.info_text:
Infect your target with a corrosive worm that deals 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 acid damage per turn for 10 turns.

If the target dies while the worm is inside, it will explode, doing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 acid damage in a radius of 4.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and can critical.
value2.name: Corrosive Worm

value.info_text:
A furious storm of blighted poison rages around the caster in a radius of 4 for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Each creature hit by the storm takes 22, 29, 35, 40, 45 blight damage and is poisoned for 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 blight damage over 4 turns.

At talent level 2 you have a chance to inflict Insidious Blight, reducing healing factor by 63%, 86%, 104%, 119%, 132%.

At talent level 4 you have a chance to inflict Numbing Blight, reducing damage dealt by 38%, 51%, 62%, 71%, 79%.

At talent level 6 you have a chance to inflict Crippling Blight, giving a 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% chance for talent failure.

The chance is evenly split between possible effects.

The damage and secondary effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Poison Storm

value2.info_text:
A furious poison storm rages around the caster in a radius of 4 for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Each creature hit by the storm is poisoned for 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 nature damage over 6 turns.

Poisoning is cumulative; the longer they stay in the storm, the higher the poison damage they take.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and can critical.
value2.name: Poison Storm

value.info_text:
Conjures up a spear of bones, doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage to all targets in line, and inflicting bleeding for another 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 damage over 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Bone Spear

value2.info_text:
Conjures up a spear of bones, doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage to all targets in line.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Bone Spear

value.info_text:
Grab a target and teleport it to your side, pinning it there with a bone rising from the ground for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The bone will also deal 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 physical damage, inflicting bleeding for another 47, 63, 76, 87, 97 damage over 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Bone Grab

value2.info_text:
Grab a target and teleport it to your side, pinning it there with a bone rising from the ground for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The bone will also deal 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 physical damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Bone Grab

value.info_text:
Fire bone spears in all directions, hitting all foes within radius 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 for 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 physical damage, and inflicting bleeding for another 61, 82, 99, 113, 125 damage over 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Bone Nova

value2.info_text:
Fire bone spears in all directions, hitting all foes within radius 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 for 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 physical damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Bone Nova

value.info_text:
Infects the target with parasitic carrion worm larvae for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Each turn the disease will remove a beneficial physical effect and deal 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 acid and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 blight damage.

If not cleared after five turns it will inflict 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 acid damage as the larvae hatch, removing the effect but spawning a full grown carrion worm mass near the target's location.
value.name: Worm Rot

value.info_text:
Make your target's diseases burst, doing 55, 75, 90, 103, 115 blight damage for each disease it is infected with.

This will also spread any diseases to any nearby foes in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Cyst Burst

value2.info_text:
Make your target's diseases burst, doing 55, 75, 90, 103, 115 blight damage for each disease it is infected with.

This will also spread any decrepitude, weakness, rotting or epidemic diseases to any nearby foes in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Cyst Burst

value.info_text:
Your body has become a mass of living corruption, increasing your blight and acid resistance by 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32%, blight affinity by 5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 26% and allowing you to heal from your carrion worm blight pools. On taking damage greater than 25%, 18%, 16%, 14%, 14% of your maximum health, the damage will be reduced by 11%, 15%, 19%, 22%, 25% and a carrion worm mass will burst forth onto an adjacent tile, attacking your foes for 10 turns.

Also increases the damage dealt by your carrion worms by 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32% and grants them the Infectious Bite spell at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. Carrion worms fully inherit your Spellpower.
value.name: Infestation

value.info_text:
Gain the ability to merge and seperate carrion worm masses.

If used on a worm mass, you merge with it, moving to it's location, healing you for 10%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% of your maximum health, restoring 6, 13, 19, 26, 32 vim, and destroying the mass.

If used on another target, you sacrifice 18%, 13%, 11%, 9%, 8% of your current health to create a worm mass at their location.

Also increases the damage and healing of your carrion worm's blight pool by 10%, 20%, 31%, 41%, 52%.
value.name: Worm Walk

value.info_text:
You have a 38%, 52%, 62%, 71%, 79% chance on dealing blight damage to cause the target to rot away, silencing, disarming, blinding or pinning them for 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns. This effect has a cooldown.

At talent level 4, this affects targets in a radius 1 ball.

Your worms also have a 5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 26% chance to blind, silence, disarm or pin with their melee attacks, lasting 2 turns.

The chance to apply this effect will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Pestilent Blight

value.info_text:
Infects the target with parasitic carrion worm larvae for 5 turns. Each turn the disease will remove a beneficial physical effect and deal 18, 24, 29, 33, 37 acid and 18, 24, 29, 33, 37 blight damage.

If not cleared after five turns it will inflict 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 blight damage as the larvae hatch, removing the effect but spawning a full grown carrion worm mass near the target's location.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Worm Rot

value.info_text:
Summon a part of the Fearscape to intersect with the current level.

Your target and yourself are taken to the Fearscape, trapped there until you end the spell or until your target dies.

While inside, a constant aura of flames will burn both of you (and heal demons) for 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 fire damage.

When the spell ends, only you and the target (if still alive) are taken back to your home plane; all summons are left in the Fearscape.

Objects will be moved as well.

This spell has no effect if cast when already inside the Fearscape.

This powerful spell drains 5 vim per turn, ending when it reaches 0, the amount drained increases by one each turn.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fearscape

value2.info_text:
Summon a part of the Fearscape to intersect with the current level.

Your target and yourself are taken to the Fearscape, trapped there until you end the spell or until your target dies.

While inside, a constant aura of flames will burn both of you (and heal demons) for 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 fire damage.

When the spell ends, only you and the target (if still alive) are taken back to your home plane; all summons are left in the Fearscape.

Objects will be moved as well.

This spell has no effect if cast when already inside the Fearscape.

This powerful spell drains 5 vim per turn, ending when it reaches 0.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Fearscape

value.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and 100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
value.name: Ambuscade

value2.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and 100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
value2.name: Ambuscade

value.info_text:
You veil yourself in shadows for 4, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns, and let them control you.

While veiled, you become immune to status effects and gain 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% all damage reduction. Each turn, you blink to a nearby foe (within range 5, 5, 6, 7, 7), hitting it for 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% darkness weapon damage.

While this goes on, you cannot be stopped unless you are killed, and you cannot control your character.
value.name: Shadow Veil

value2.info_text:
You veil yourself in shadows for 4, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns, and let them control you.

While veiled, you become immune to status effects and gain 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% all damage reduction. Each turn, you blink to a nearby foe (within range 5, 5, 6, 7, 7), hitting it for 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% darkness weapon damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

While this goes on, you cannot be stopped unless you are killed, and you cannot control your character.
value2.name: Shadow Veil

value.info_text:
Strike your opponent in the knee (or other critical point in an ambulatory appendage) for 170%, 178%, 185%, 190%, 195% weapon damage, knocking them down (1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn pin) and slowing their movement by 45%, 47%, 48%, 50%, 51% for 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns afterwards.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The slow effect becomes more powerful with your Cunning.
value.name: Kneecapper

value2.info_text:
Strike your opponent in the knee (or other critical point in an ambulatory appendage) for 170%, 178%, 185%, 190%, 195% weapon damage, knocking them down (1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn pin) and slowing their movement by 45%, 47%, 48%, 50%, 51% for 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns afterwards.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The slow effect becomes more powerful with your Cunning.
value2.name: Kneecapper

value.info_text:
Employ a specialized sniping shot at a target.

This shot is focused on precision at long range and deals base 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% ranged damage with a bonus that increases with distance.

The ranged bonus is -49% (penalty) at point blank range, while at your maximum range of 10 it is 250%.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.
value.name: Kill Shot

value2.info_text:
Employ a specialized sniping shot at a target.

This shot is focused on precision at long range and deals base 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% ranged damage with a bonus that increases with distance.

The ranged bonus is -49% (penalty) at point blank range, while at your maximum range of 10 it is 250%.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.
value2.name: Kill Shot

value.info_text:
Fire three shots in quick succession at a vulnerable point on the target (usually the head).

Each shot deals 52%, 62%, 69%, 75%, 81% Ranged damage and will try to stun or increase the target's stun duration by 1.

These shots will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The chance to stun increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Noggin Knocker

value2.info_text:
Fire three shots in quick succession at a vulnerable point on the target (usually the head).

Each shot deals 52%, 62%, 69%, 75%, 81% Ranged damage and will try to stun or increase the target's stun duration by 1.

These shots will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The chance to stun increases with your Accuracy.
value2.name: Noggin Knocker

value.info_text:
You have learned how to be stealthy even when in plain sight of your foes. You may attempt to enter stealth regardless of how close you are to your enemies, but success is more likely against fewer opponents that are farther away.

Your chance to succeed is determined by comparing 1.10, 1.79, 2.32, 2.76, 3.16 times your stealth power (currently 7, 12, 16, 19, 21) to the stealth detection of all enemies (reduced by 10% per tile distance) that have a clear line of sight to you.

You always succeed if you are not directly observed.

This resets the cooldown of your Stealth talent, and, if successful, all creatures currently following you will lose track of your position.

You estimate your current chance to hide as 100.0%.
value.name: Hide in Plain Sight

value2.info_text:
You have learned how to be stealthy even when in plain sight of your foes. You may attempt to enter stealth regardless of how close you are to your enemies, but success is more likely against fewer opponents that are farther away.

Your chance to succeed is determined by comparing 1.10, 1.79, 2.32, 2.76, 3.16 times your stealth power (currently 16, 26, 34, 41, 47) to the stealth detection of all enemies (reduced by 10% per tile distance) that have a clear line of sight to you.

You always succeed if you are not directly observed.

If successful, all creatures currently following you will lose track of your position.

This also resets the cooldown of your Stealth talent.
value2.name: Hide in Plain Sight

value.info_text:
You are able to perform usually unstealthy actions (attacking, using objects, …) without breaking stealth. When you perform such an action while stealthed, you have a chance to stay hidden.

Success is more likely against fewer opponents and is determined by comparing 0.57, 1.14, 1.58, 1.94, 2.27 times your stealth power (currently 3, 7, 10, 13, 15) to the stealth detection (reduced by 10% per tile distance) of all enemies that have a clear line of sight to you.

Your base chance of success is 100% if you are not directly observed, and good or bad luck may also affect it.

You estimate your current chance to maintain stealth as 100.0%.
value.name: Unseen Actions

value2.info_text:
You are able to perform usually unstealthy actions (attacking, using objects, …) without breaking stealth. When you perform such an action while stealthed, you have a chance to stay hidden. Success is more likely against fewer opponents and is determined by comparing 0.57, 1.14, 1.58, 1.94, 2.27 times your stealth power (currently 8, 17, 23, 29, 34) to the stealth detection (reduced by 10% per tile distance) of all enemies that have a clear line of sight to you.

Your base chance of success is 100% if you are not directly observed, and good or bad luck may also affect it.
value2.name: Unseen Actions

value.info_text:
Target a nearby shadow, and command it to merge into a nearby enemy, reducing their damage by 13%, 24%, 33%, 41%, 47% for 5 turns.

Killing your shadow releases some of your inner hatred, restoring 8 Hate to yourself.
value.name: Merge

value.info_text:
Target a nearby shadow, and force it to slam into a nearby enemy, dealing 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 Physical damage.

Your shadow will then set them as their target, and they will target your shadow.

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Stone

value.info_text:
Command all Shadows within sight to tele-dash to a target location, damaging any enemies they pass through for 142, 193, 232, 265, 294 Physical damage.

For the purpose of this talent, you force your shadows through any walls in their way.

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Shadow's Path

value.info_text:
Share your hatred with all shadows within sight range, gaining temporary full control. You then fire a blast of pure hatred from all affected shadows, dealing 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 Mind damage per blast.

You cannot cancel this talent once the first bolt is cast.

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Cursed Bolt

value.info_text:
Feed from the essence of your enemy. Draws 4.3, 5.2, 5.9, 6.6, 7.1 hate per turn from a targeted foe, as long as they remain in your line of sight.

Hate gain improves with your Mindpower.
value.name: Feed

value2.info_text:
Feed from the essence of your enemy. Draws 4.3, 5.2, 5.9, 6.6, 7.1 hate per turn from a targeted foe, as long as they remain in your line of sight.

Hate gain improves with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Feed

value.info_text:
Creeping dark slowly spreads from 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The dark deals 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 darkness damage each turn to anything in its area, and blocks the sight of any who do not possess Dark Vision or some other magical means of seeing.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower. You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
value.name: Creeping Darkness

value2.info_text:
Creeping dark slowly spreads from 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The dark deals 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 damage, and blocks the sight of any who do not possess Dark Vision or some other magical means of seeing.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower. You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
value2.name: Creeping Darkness

value.info_text:
When you focus your attacks on a single foe and strike them in melee for two consecutive turns, your hatred of them overcomes you and you begin to stalk them with single-minded purpose. The effect will last for 40 turns, or until your prey is dead. Stalking gives you bonuses against your foe that grow each turn you hit them, and diminish each turn you don't.

Bonus level 1: +13, +17, +20, +22, +24 Accuracy, +8%, +9%, +9%, +10%, +11% melee damage, +0.50 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 2: +18, +24, +28, +32, +35 Accuracy, +16%, +18%, +19%, +21%, +23% melee damage, +1.00 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 3: +22, +29, +35, +39, +43 Accuracy, +24%, +27%, +29%, +32%, +35% melee damage, +1.50 hate/turn prey was hit

The accuracy bonus improves with your Willpower, and the melee damage bonus with your Strength.
value.name: Stalk

value2.info_text:
When you focus your attacks on a single foe and strike them in melee for two consecutive turns, your hatred of them overcomes you and you begin to stalk them with single-minded purpose. The effect will last for 40 turns, or until your prey is dead. Stalking gives you bonuses against your foe that grow each turn you hit them, and diminish each turn you don't.

Bonus level 1: +13, +17, +20, +22, +24 Accuracy, +8%, +9%, +9%, +10%, +11% melee damage, +0.50 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 2: +18, +24, +28, +32, +35 Accuracy, +16%, +18%, +19%, +21%, +23% melee damage, +1.00 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 3: +22, +29, +35, +39, +43 Accuracy, +24%, +27%, +29%, +32%, +35% melee damage, +1.50 hate/turn prey was hit

The accuracy bonus improves with your Willpower, and the melee damage bonus with your Strength.
value2.name: Stalk

value.info_text:
Create a barrier that siphons hate from you at the rate of 0.2 a turn. The barrier will deflect 50% of incoming damage with the force of your will, up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575 damage. The barrier charges at a rate of 1/26, 1/15, 1/11, 1/9, 1/8 of its maximum charge per turn.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

The maximum damage deflected increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Deflection

value2.info_text:
Create a barrier that siphons hate from you at the rate of 0.2 a turn. The barrier will deflect 50% of incoming damage with the force of your will, up to 163, 221, 266, 304, 338 damage. The barrier charges at a rate of 1/35th of its maximum charge per turn.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

The maximum damage deflected increases with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Deflection

value.info_text:
Your fury becomes an unseen force that randomly lashes out at foes around you. For 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns you strike 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 (39%, 86%, 23%, 54%, 81% chance for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3) nearby target(s) within range 5 doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 damage and 2 knockback. The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Unseen Force

value2.info_text:
Your fury becomes an unseen force that randomly lashes out at foes around you. For 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns you strike 1 (0% chance for 2) nearby target(s) within range 5 doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 damage and 2 knockback. The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Unseen Force

value.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. The base damage (doubled) and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict cross tier effects which can be critical hits. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

If attacking with two mindstars the attack will trigger their proc effects, if any.

Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)
value.name: Gesture of Pain

value2.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. It also does not trigger any physical on-hit effects. However, the base damage and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict cross tier effects which can be critical hits. The damage will increase with your Mindpower. Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)
value2.name: Gesture of Pain

value.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 51, 91, 112, 125, 133 damage (113%, 200%, 246%, 274%, 292% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning).

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value.name: Gesture of Guarding

value2.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 7, 9, 12, 14, 16 damage (16%, 22%, 27%, 32%, 36% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning).

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value2.name: Gesture of Guarding

value.info_text:
You unleash your hateful mind on any who dare approach you, inflicing 220, 298, 359, 410, 456 mind damage. The attack will hit multiple targets, but each additional target will further reduce damage by 21%, 14%, 11%, 9%, 8%.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Reproach

value2.info_text:
You unleash your hateful mind on any who dare approach you, inflicing 191, 259, 312, 357, 396 mind damage. The attack will hit multiple targets, but each additional target will further reduce damage by 19%.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Reproach

value.info_text:
Send a whisper filled with hate to spread throughout your foes. When the whisper is first heard, they will suffer 205, 279, 335, 383, 426 mind damage and feed you 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 hate. For the first 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns, the whisper will travel from the original victim to a new one within a range of 2.0, 3.0, 3.0, 4.0, 4.0. Every victim of the whisper has a 17%, 24%, 29%, 34%, 38% chance of spreading it to another victim every turn.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Hateful Whisper

value2.info_text:
Send a whisper filled with hate to spread throughout your foes. When the whisper is first heard, they will suffer 205, 279, 335, 383, 426 mind damage and feed you 2 hate. For the first 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns, the whisper will travel from the original victim to a new one within a range of 1.6, 2.3, 2.8, 3.2, 3.6. Every victim of the whisper has a 17%, 24%, 29%, 34%, 38% chance of spreading it to another victim every turn.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Hateful Whisper

value.info_text:
While this ability is active, you will continually call up to 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 level 1, 10, 25, 40, 50 shadows to aid you in battle. Each shadow costs 5 hate to summon. Shadows are weak combatants that can: Use Arcane Reconstruction to heal themselves (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), Blindside their opponents (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), and Phase Door from place to place.

Shadows ignore 14%, 44%, 68%, 87%, 100% of the damage dealt to them by their master.
value.name: Call Shadows

value2.info_text: While this ability is active, you will continually call up to 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 level 1, 10, 25, 40, 50 shadows to aid you in battle. Each shadow costs 6 hate to summon. Shadows are weak combatants that can: Use Arcane Reconstruction to heal themselves (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), Blindside their opponents (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), and Phase Door from place to place.
value2.name: Call Shadows

value.info_text:
Focus your shadows on a single target. Friendly targets will be defended for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns. Hostile targets will be attacked, with a 47%, 66%, 75%, 80%, 84% chance the shadows will blindside the target.

If you have less than maximum shadows available, they will automatically be summoned before focusing.

This talent has no cost.
value.name: Focus Shadows

value2.info_text:
Focus your shadows on a single target. Friendly targets will be defended for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns. Hostile targets will be attacked, with a 47%, 66%, 75%, 80%, 84% chance the shadows will blindside the target.

This talent has no cost.
value2.name: Focus Shadows

value.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value.info_text:
Activate the infusion to cure yourself of one random physical, mental, or magical effect and increase affinity for all damage by 0% (scales with Constitution) for 0 turns.

Also removes cross-tier effects of the affected types for free.
value.name: Infusion: Primal

value2.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value2.info_text:
Activate the infusion to cure yourself of one random physical, mental, or magical effect and increase affinity for all damage by 0% for 0 turns.

Also removes cross-tier effects of the affected types for free.
value2.name: Infusion: Primal

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Sleep

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Sleep

value.info_text: Clears your mind of current mental effects, and blocks additional ones over 6 turns. At most, 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 mental effects will be affected.
value.name: Mental Shielding

value2.info_text:
Clears your mind of current mental effects, and blocks additional ones over 6 turns. At most, 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 mental effects will be affected.

This talent takes no time to use.
value2.name: Mental Shielding

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Nightmare

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Nightmare

value.info_text:
Telekintically grasp a weapon or gem using mentally-directed forces, holding it aloft and bringing it to bear with the power of your mind alone.

Note: The normal restrictions on worn equipment do not apply to this item.
value.name: Telekinetic Grasp

value2.info_text: Encase a weapon or gem in mentally-controlled forces, holding it aloft and bringing it to bear with the power of your mind alone.
value2.name: Telekinetic Grasp

value.info_text:
Allows you to wield a physical melee or ranged weapon, a mindstar or a gem telekinetically, gaining a special effect for each.

A gem will provide a +3 bonus to all primary stats per tier of the gem.

A mindstar will randomly try to telekinetically grab a far away foe (10% chance and range 2 for a tier 1 mindstar, +1 range and +5% chance for each tier above 1) and pull it into melee range.

A physical melee weapon will act as a semi independant entity, automatically attacking adjacent foes each turn, while a ranged weapon will fire at your target whenever you perform a ranged attack.

While this talent is active, all melee and ranged attacks use 60% of your Cunning and Willpower in place of Dexterity and Strength for accuracy and damage calculations respectively.
value.name: Beyond the Flesh

value2.info_text:
Allows you to wield a physical melee weapon, a mindstar or a gem telekinetically, gaining a special effect for each.

A gem will provide +3 bonus to all primary stats per tier of the gem.

A mindstar will randomly try to telekinetically grab a far away foe (10% chance and range 2 for a tier 1 mindstar, +1 range and +5% chance for each tier above 1) and pull it into melee range.

A physical melee weapon will act as a semi independant entity, attacking foes nearby each turn while also replacing Strength and Dexterity with 60% of your Willpower and Cunning, for accuracy and damage calculations. This stat usage modification will also apply to conventionally wielded weapons.
value2.name: Beyond the Flesh

value.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Slumber

value2.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Slumber

value.info_text:
Increases the amount of damage you can deal to sleeping targets before reducing the effect duration by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%, and reduces the sleep immunity of your Insomnia effects by 4%, 8%, 9%, 10%, 10%.

These effects will be directly reflected in the appropriate talent descriptions.

The damage threshold bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Sandman

value2.info_text:
Increases the amount of damage you can deal to sleeping targets before reducing the effect duration by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%, and reduces the sleep immunity of your Insomnia effects by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11%.

These effects will be directly reflected in the appropriate talent descriptions.

The damage threshold bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Sandman

value.info_text:
Halflings have one of the most powerful military forces in the known world and they have been at war with most other races for thousand of years.

Removes 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 stun, daze, or pin effects, and makes you immune to stuns, dazes and pins for 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.
value.name: Indomitable

value2.info_text:
Halflings have one of the most powerful military forces in the known world and they have been at war with most other races for thousand of years.

Removes 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 stun, daze, or pin effects, and makes you immune to stuns, dazes and pins for 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

This talent takes no time to use.
value2.name: Indomitable

value.info_text:
Summons your lust for blood and destruction, especially when the odds are against you.

You increase your damage by 10% + 1.0%, 2.3%, 3.9%, 5.0%, 6.0% per enemy in line of sight up to 5 (max 15%, 22%, 29%, 35%, 40%) for 3 turns.

The damage bonus will increase with your Constitution.
value.name: Orcish Fury

value2.info_text:
Summons your lust for blood and destruction, increasing all damage you deal by 12%, 16%, 22%, 26%, 30% for 5 turns.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
value2.name: Orcish Fury

value.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 10 turns.

Also increase physical save by +5, +9, +13, +16, +19.
value.name: Hold the Ground

value2.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

Increase physical and mental save by +7, +14, +20, +25, +30.
value2.name: Hold the Ground

value.info_text:
Orcs have seen countless battles, and won many of them.

You revel in the defeat of your foes, gaining 9%, 11%, 12%, 13%, 14% damage resistance for 2 turns each time you kill an enemy.

The resistance will scale with your talent level and Constitution.

Passively increase all damage penetration by 8%, 12%, 13%, 15%, 15%.
value.name: Skirmisher

value2.info_text:
Orcs have seen countless battles, and won many of them.

Increase all damage penetration by 8%, 12%, 13%, 15%, 15%.
value2.name: Skirmisher

value.info_text:
Call upon the will of all of the Orc Prides to survive this battle.

You remove up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 detrimental effect(s) then heal for 219, 270, 308, 340, 367 life.

The healing will increase with your talent level and Willpower.
value.name: Pride of the Orcs

value2.info_text:
Call upon the will of all of the Orc Prides to survive this battle.

You heal for 270, 286, 298, 306, 312 life, and remove up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 detrimental effects.

The healing will increase with your Constitution.
value2.name: Pride of the Orcs

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically gain a damage shield equal to 55%, 61%, 64%, 67%, 69% of the heal value for 3 turns.

This will replace an existing damage shield if the new shield value and duration would be greater than or equal to the old.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Arcane Shield

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically get a damage shield of 55%, 61%, 64%, 67%, 69% of the heal value for 3 turns.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Arcane Shield

value.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 16, 18, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 1, 1).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Phase Door

value2.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 16, 18, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 1, 1). If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will fizzle.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Phase Door

value.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200).

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 18, 16, 15, 14).

Random teleports have a minimum range of 15.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Teleport

value2.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200), with a minimum range of 15.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 18, 16, 15, 14).

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Teleport

value.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Arcane damage is increased by 22%, 28%, 33%, 37%, 40%, Arcane damage penetration by 7.1%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, 15% and you gain the power to invoke volcanos:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 10

Range: 10

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: 200% of base

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: Summons a small raging volcano for 1 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 1 of your foes, dealing 0.89, 1.46, 2.42, 3.39, 4.37 fire and 0.89, 1.46, 2.42, 3.39, 4.37 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Volcanic Rock

value2.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Arcane damage is increased by 22%, 28%, 33%, 37%, 40%, Arcane damage penetration by 7.1%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, 15% and you gain the power to invoke volcanos:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 10

Range: 10

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: 200% of base

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: Summons a small raging volcano for 1 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 1 of your foes, dealing 0.89, 1.46, 2.42, 3.39, 4.37 fire and 0.89, 1.46, 2.42, 3.39, 4.37 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Volcanic Rock

value.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Nature damage is increased by 22%, 28%, 33%, 37%, 40%, Nature damage penetration by 7.1%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, 15% and you gain the power to throw boulders:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Equilibrium cost: 5

Range: 10

Cooldown: 3

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Standard (100% of a turn)

Is: a nature gift

Description: Throws a huge boulder at a target, damaging it for 12.00 and knocking it back 0 tiles.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
value.name: Boulder Rock

value2.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Nature damage is increased by 22%, 28%, 33%, 37%, 40%, Nature damage penetration by 7.1%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, 15% and you gain the power to throw boulders:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Equilibrium cost: 5

Range: 10

Cooldown: 3

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Standard (100% of a turn)

Is: a nature gift

Description: Throws a huge boulder at a target, damaging it for 12.00 and knocking it back 0 tiles.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
value2.name: Boulder Rock

value.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Stone Wall

value2.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Stone Wall

value.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animated blade for 10 turns.
value.name: Animate Blade

value2.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animate blade for 10 turns.
value2.name: Animate Blade

value.info_text: Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
value.name: Metaflow

value2.info_text: Your mastery of the arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of most of your spells of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
value2.name: Metaflow

value.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 229, 324, 397, 458, 513 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
value.name: Elemental bolt

value.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 229, 324, 397, 458, 513 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
value.name: Elemental Bolt

value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 115%, 130%, 141%, 151%, 159% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
value.name: Shattering Blow

value2.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 110%, 123%, 132%, 141%, 148% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
value2.name: Shattering Blow

value.info_text:
Rush toward a target spot with incredible speed.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there.

This attack does 120% weapon damage and can daze the target for 3 turns if it hits.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
value.name: Rush

value2.info_text:
Rushes toward your target with incredible speed. If the target is reached, you get a free attack doing 120% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target is dazed for 3 turns.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
value2.name: Rush

value.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not already cooling down.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While wielding a shield, the chance is reduced by one quarter.

While dual wielding, the chance is reduced by half for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Flame, Pulverizing Auger, Lightning, Earthen Missiles
value.name: Arcane Combat

value2.info_text:
Allows you to use a melee weapon to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to deliver a Flame, Lightning or Earthen Missiles spell as a free action on the target.

When using a shield the chance is reduced by one fourth.

When dual wielding or using a shield the chance is halved for each weapon.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not cooling down.

The chance increases with your Cunning.
value2.name: Arcane Combat

value.info_text:
Raw magical damage channels through the caster's weapon, increasing raw Physical Power by 0.21, 0.43, 0.59, 0.73, 0.86 of your Magic (current bonus: 20, 42, 59, 73, 85).

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 ball of either fire, lightning or arcane damage, doing 109, 148, 187, 226, 265.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 75% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.
value.name: Arcane Destruction

value2.info_text:
Raw magical damage channels through the caster's weapon, increasing Physical Power by 20, 42, 59, 73, 85.

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 ball of either fire, lightning or arcane damage, doing 109, 148, 187, 226, 265.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 75% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.
value2.name: Arcane Destruction

value.info_text: Raise your shield into blocking position for one turn, reducing the damage of all error! attacks by 200. If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn.
value.name: Block

value2.info_text: Raise your shield into blocking position for one turn, reducing the damage of all error! attacks by 0. If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn.
value2.name: Block

value.info_text: Explode against one target for 1.00 cold damage.
value.name: Will o' the Wisp Explode

value2.info_text: Explodes.
value2.name: Will o' the Wisp Explode

value.info_text:
Bite the target, dealing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% melee damage

If the attack hits you'll inject blight poison into the target, dealing 34, 46, 55, 63, 70 blight damage and a further 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 blight damage over 4 turns.

The bonus damage improves with your Spellpower.
value.name: Infectious Bite

value.info_text: While activated, your basic Shot talent now fires 3 times, with each attack dealing 35%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 67% Ranged damage, at a cost of 25 Stamina per attack.
value.name: Bombardment

value2.info_text: While activated, your basic Shot talent now fires 3 sling bullets, each dealing 35%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 67% Ranged damage, at a cost of 25 Stamina per attack.
value2.name: Bombardment

value.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 7.9%, 14%, 18%, 21%, 23% (based on your Defense).
value.name: Reflex Defense

value2.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 8.0%, 14%, 18%, 21%, 24% (based on your Defense).
value2.name: Reflex Defense

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with an elemental aura. When you deal a critical hit with an element, you have a chance to trigger a special effect.

Arcane damage has a 30% chance to increase your spellcasting speed by 20% for 5 turns.

Fire damage has a 30% chance to cleanse all physical or magical detrimental effects on you.

Cold damage has a 30% chance to turn your skin into ice for 5 turns, reducing physical damage taken by 30%, increasing armor by 20, 26, 35, 42, 50, and dealing 100 ice damage to attackers.

Lightning damage has a 30% chance to transform you into pure lightning for 5 turns; any damage will displace you to an adjacent tile and ignore the damage (can only happen once per turn).

Light damage has a 30% chance to create a barrier around you, absorbing 120, 150, 200, 250, 300 damage for 5 turns.

Nature damage has a 30% chance to harden your skin, preventing the application of any magical detrimental effects for 5 turns.

The Cold and Light effects scale with your Cunning.

These effects only trigger for hits over 4, 40, 100, 160, 200 damage (based on your level).
value.name: Elemental Surge
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have dealt over 50000 arcane, fire, cold, lightning, light or nature damage

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with an elemental aura. When you deal a critical hit with an element, you have a chance to trigger a special effect.

Arcane damage has a 30% chance to increase your spellcasting speed by 20% for 5 turns.

Fire damage has a 30% chance to cleanse all physical or magical detrimental effects on you.

Cold damage has a 30% chance to turn your skin into ice for 5 turns, reducing physical damage taken by 30%, increasing armor by 20, 26, 35, 42, 50, and dealing 100 ice damage to attackers.

Lightning damage has a 30% chance to transform you into pure lightning for 5 turns; any damage will teleport you to an adjacent tile and ignore the damage (can only happen once per turn).

Light damage has a 30% chance to create a barrier around you, absorbing 120, 150, 200, 250, 300 damage for 5 turns.

Nature damage has a 30% chance to harden your skin, preventing the application of any magical detrimental effects for 5 turns.

The Cold and Light effects scale with your Cunning.

These effects only trigger for hits over 4, 40, 100, 160, 200 damage (based on your level).
value2.name: Elemental Surge
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have dealt over 50000 arcane, fire, cold, lightning, light or nature damage

value.info_text:
You have friends in low places and have learned some underhanded tricks.

Gain 0.2 Category Mastery to the Cunning/Stealth Category (or unlock it, if you have the tree and it is locked), and either gain +0.1 to the Cunning/Scoundrel category or learn and unlock the category at 0.9 if you lack it.

Additionally, all of your damage penalties from invisibility are permanently halved.
value.name: Tricks of the Trade
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have sided with the Assassin Lord

You have friends in low places and have learned some underhanded tricks.

Additionally, all of your damage penalties from invisibility are permanently halved.
value2.name: Tricks of the Trade
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have sided with the Assassin Lord

value.name: Windblade
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with dual wielded weapons

value2.name: Windblade
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with dual wielded weapons

value.info_text:
You fire a shot straight at your enemy's vital areas, wounding them terribly.

Enemies hit by this shot will take 450% weapon damage and will be stunned and crippled (losing 50% physical, magical and mental attack speeds) for five turns due to the devastating impact of the shot.

The stun and cripple chances increase with your Accuracy.
value.name: Vital Shot
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with ranged weapons

value2.info_text:
You fire a shot straight at your enemy's vital areas, wounding them terribly.

Enemies hit by this shot will take 450% weapon damage and will be stunned and crippled (losing 50% physical, magical and mental attack speeds) for five turns due to the devastating impact of the shot.

The stun and cripple chances increase with your Accuracy.
value2.name: Vital Shot
require: Level 30, Dex 50; Have dealt over 50000 damage with ranged weapons

value.info_text:
You manifest a thin layer of aether all around you. Any attack passing through it will check arcane resistance instead of the incoming damage resistance.

In effect, all of your resistances are equal to 66% of your arcane resistance, which is increased by 20%.
value.name: Aether Permeation
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have at least 25% arcane damage reduction and have been exposed to the void of space

value2.info_text:
You manifest a thin layer of aether all around you. Any attack passing through it will check arcane resistance instead of the incoming damage resistance.

In effect, all of your resistances are equal to 66% of your arcane resistance.
value2.name: Aether Permeation
require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have at least 25% arcane damage reduction and have been exposed to the void of space

value.info_text:
You have learned to harness your latent arcane powers, channeling them through your weapon.

This has the following effects:

Equipped weapons are treated as having an additional 50% Magic modifier;

Your raw Physical Power is increased by 100% of your raw Spellpower;

Your physical critical chance is increased by 25% of your bonus spell critical chance.
value.name: Arcane Might

value2.info_text:
You have learned to harness your latent arcane powers, channeling them through your weapon.

Equipped weapons are treated as having an additional 50% Magic modifier.
value2.name: Arcane Might

value.info_text:
For 6 turns you gain the mass and power of a star, drawing all creatures within radius 5 toward you and dealing 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 fire, 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 light and 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 physical damage to all foes.

Foes closer to you take up to 150% damage.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
value.name: Irresistible Sun
require: Level 30, Str 50; Have dealt over 50000 light or fire damage

value2.info_text:
For 6 turns you gain the mass and power of a star, drawing all creatures within radius 5 toward you and dealing 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 fire, 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 light and 22, 31, 45, 59, 73 physical damage to all foes.

Foes closer to you take up to 150% more damage.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
value2.name: Irresistible Sun
require: Level 30, Str 50; Have dealt over 50000 light or fire damage

value.info_text:
Blast a wave of water all around you with a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, making all creatures Wet for 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Drench

value.info_text:
Calls forth a powerful beam of lightning doing 81, 109, 131, 150, 167 to 242, 328, 394, 451, 501 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Call Lightning

value2.info_text:
Calls forth a powerful beam of lightning doing 81, 109, 131, 150, 167 to 242, 328, 394, 451, 501 damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Call Lightning

value.info_text:
Latch on to the target and suck their blood, doing 0.50, 5.00, 13, 20, 25 physical and 0.50, 5.00, 13, 20, 25 acid damage per turn.

After 5 turns of drinking, drop off and gain the ability to Multiply.

Damage scales with your level.
value.message: @Source@ tries to latch on and suck blood!
value.name: Blood Suckers
